name: UNDER CONSTRUCTION (FatPalm, ForSiens)
description:
UNDER CONSTRUCTION is an isometric sci-fi hack&slash game set on a far away planet called 'Forge'. Once a land of unlimited riches, the planet has turned to mere shadow of its former self.

You travel the Forge as a humanoid girl with one purpose - to understand what happened on this planet. Traverse the world with your trusty Sword - an technological wonder of the past, fight various robotic enemies and find out the truth of the Forge's fate.

DevGAMM page - https://games.devgamm.com/online2020/games/under-construction

Our site - https://fatpalmgames.com/
